EmailTemplate.name: Lacerte DPO Under $1,200
EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit Lacerte Deferred Payment Option
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are receiving this communication because you recently applied for our Deferred Payment Option. In order to be eligible for this benefit, your total cost must be greater than $1,200, including taxes, shipping and handling. Unfortunately, your product selection did not meet this threshold.
Log in to My Account to select the payment option that works best for you. Alternatively, contact us at: Lacerte 800-765-7777 if you would like to add additional products to your license.
Thank you for choosing Lacerte Tax. We value you as a customer.
Sincerely,
The Lacerte Team
Intuit ProConnect Group
